structure.unit: STRAYS AND ANIMALS RUNNING AT LARGE

law.history: Repealed 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 7, effective July 15, 2010. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 45.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Owner of animal unknown -- Notice -- Gelding.
